name: @vrly-de/monorepo
description: VRLY - AI-Powered Workflow Automation for Psychotherapists
author: Phichayut 'Florentin' Sakwiset <florentin.sakwiset@vrly.de>

scripts.dev:website: bun run --cwd packages/website wrangler types && bun run --cwd packages/website astro dev
scripts.build:website: bun run --cwd packages/website wrangler types && bun run --cwd packages/website astro check && bun run --cwd packages/website astro build
scripts.preview:website: bun run --cwd packages/website wrangler types && bun run build:website && bun run --cwd packages/website wrangler dev
scripts.clean: bun run clean:dist && bun run clean:node_modules && bun run clean:.wrangler && bun run clean:.astro
